[DQC.US.0087.9369] The element us-gaap:OperatingLeaseLiability with a value of 31,676,000 has been used in the filing but does not appear in the financial statements of the filing. This disclosure should appear in the face financials unless it is included in another account caption. If this is the case either: 1. The element OperatingLeaseLiabilityStatementOfFinancialPositionExtensibleList should be used to identify the account where the Operating Lease liability is included; or 2. The Balance Sheet location axis should be used with two or more account members to identify into which financial statement captions the Operating Lease liability has been apportioned.
Period :2022-03-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals: -3
Rule Element Id:9369 Rule version: 22.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1005229/000100522923000169/cmco-20230331.htm 4

[DQC.US.0087.9369] The element us-gaap:OperatingLeaseLiability with a value of 54,490,000 has been used in the filing but does not appear in the financial statements of the filing. This disclosure should appear in the face financials unless it is included in another account caption. If this is the case either: 1. The element OperatingLeaseLiabilityStatementOfFinancialPositionExtensibleList should be used to identify the account where the Operating Lease liability is included; or 2. The Balance Sheet location axis should be used with two or more account members to identify into which financial statement captions the Operating Lease liability has been apportioned.
Period :2023-03-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals: -3
Rule Element Id:9369 Rule version: 22.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1005229/000100522923000169/cmco-20230331.htm 4
